## Additional Information Needed

Thank you for reporting this issue. To help us investigate and resolve it, we need more information.

Please provide:

### For Bug Reports:
- [ ] Steps to reproduce the issue
- [ ] Expected vs. actual behavior
- [ ] Browser and version
- [ ] Operating system
- [ ] Console errors or logs
- [ ] Screenshots if applicable

### For Feature Requests:
- [ ] Detailed use case
- [ ] Why this feature is important
- [ ] Examples or mockups
- [ ] Proposed implementation approach

### For Documentation Issues:
- [ ] Specific location of the problem
- [ ] What's unclear or incorrect
- [ ] Suggested improvements

---

**Note**: This issue will be marked as stale and may be closed if no additional information is provided within 14 days. Please respond when you have a chance to provide the requested details.

If you need help gathering this information, feel free to ask!
